name: Pokémon Altair/Sirius
description:
Altair/Sirius were the first two of romhack games made in Japan by Pokemon Vega Team and translated to English by Dr. Akimbo. They're both based off of the PKMN Emerald ROM, and are direct sequels to the story of Ruby/Sapphire/Emerald!

3 years later... after the great Hoenn Catastrophe... Hoenn is still suffering from the effects of a mysterious meteor shower...

and now... Meteoric Pokemon and Pokemon from other regions (like Sinnoh, Johto and Kanto) have inhabited Hoenn!

You and your rival are given the task to catalogue these brand new Pokemon. Along the way, you're to thwart the likes of Teams Black Hole and White Hole, as they try to oncemore summon the super-ancient Pokemon, all while on your quest to collect the 8 Gym Badges and take on the Pokemon League!!

Do you have what it takes, Trainer?
